endpoints.GET get/collections/<coll_id>/list: Get all documents in a collection
endpoints.GET get/collections/<coll_id>/<doc_id>/i: Get names of all images in a document
endpoints.GET get/collections/<coll_id>/<doc_id>/p: Get page ids of pages in a document
Get all pages in a document
endpoints.GET get/collections/<coll_id>/<doc_id>/t: Get transcript ids of a document
endpoints.GET get/collections/<coll_id>/<doc_id>/<: Get page information in XML format
Get page XML of a page
